thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Case Against Ex-Cuomo Aide Jeopardized by Witness’s Arrest

author: Erica Orden
title: Case Against Ex-Cuomo Aide Jeopardized by Witness’s Arrest
text:
A key witness in the case against a former aide to New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo was arrested and taken into custody on Thursday night following his admission in court that he likely had violated his cooperation deal with federal prosecutors. 
The arrest of the witness, Todd Howe, likely signals that prosecutors will nullify his cooperation agreement, a move that could cast doubt on his four days of testimony and jeopardize the government’s case against the Cuomo aide.
...
